Name: Doctor No. 1
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lime combines well with the aromatic spices in Swedish punch .
History: A recipe for a Doctor Cocktail made with Swedish punch and lime juice first appears in Hugo R. Ensslin's 1917 Recipes for Mixed Drinks (2nd Edition) (It may have also appeared in his 1916 first edition.)
Nutrition: One serving of Doctor No. 1 contains 161 calories
